exam.name: German TELC B1

onboarding.welcome: Let's prepare for the German TELC B1 exam together

disclaimer.text1: This app is NOT affiliated with, endorsed by, or connected to TELC GmbH. We are an independent educational tool created to help students prepare for the TELC B1 German language examination.
disclaimer.checkboxLabel: I understand that this app is only a simulation tool for exam preparation and is not an official TELC application. I acknowledge that using this app does not guarantee any specific results in the actual TELC B1 exam.

help.exampleNote: This is a complete example of a personal introduction for the TELC B1 oral exam. You can use this as a reference to create your own.
